roleset.name: slap on the back

example.name: this is a noun!
example.text: Still , amid all the backslapping and signs of relief over yesterday 's events , some market professionals cautioned that there is nothing present in the current market system to prevent another dizzying drop such as Friday 's .

roleset.note: BACKSLAP-V NOTES: Frames file for 'backslap' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry. (from backslap.01-v predicate notes)
